item.title: Fall 2022 Harvard Map Collection
item.description: GIS definitions What is GIS used for? John Snow cholera map, 1854. John Snow cholera map, overlaid by a modern-day GIS heatmap layer. GIS data layers GIS data layers diagram. OldNYC: Mapping Historic Photographs at the NYPL . Property research with GIS Belle’s house in college. City of Boston Archives Reading Room. 19th century insurance atlas, open to a plate of downtown Boston. Microfilm reader. Milwaukee probate records on mircofilm.
